ads.title: Coastal Glow Sunscreen
ads.description: Protect your skin and radiate beauty with Coastal Glow Sunscreen! Our SPF 50+ formula not only shields you from harmful UV rays but also adds a subtle shimmer to your skin, leaving you glowing like the ocean under the moonlight. Lightweight, water-resistant, and reef-safe, Coastal Glow is the ultimate beach essential for mermaids and beach babes alike.
keyFeatures: 🌞 Infused with sea minerals and aloe
✨ Subtle shimmering effect for a radiant look
ads.cta: Get your glow on! Find Coastal Glow at beach shops or online at CoastalGlow.com.

ads.title: Drift & Bloom: Oceanic Jewelry
ads.description: Every piece of jewelry tells a story, and Drift & Bloom captures the essence of the sea in every design. Handcrafted from locally sourced sea glass, shells, and driftwood, our necklaces, bracelets, and earrings are perfect for beach days, date nights, or just dreaming of the shore.
ads.specialOffer: Order online and get a free Sea Sparkle Anklet with purchases over $50.

ads.title: Ocean’s Muse Perfume
ads.description: Introducing Ocean’s Muse, a fragrance inspired by the mysteries of the tide and the magic of the shoreline. Let every spritz transport you to a place where the waves kiss the sand and the breeze whispers your name.
ads.cta: Discover the scent of the sea. Available now at select boutiques and online at OceansMuseFragrance.com.
ads.closingLine: Because the ocean is always calling.
